description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. In EvilQuest, take on the role of Galvis -- a dark knight obsessed with ultimate power. Set out on a quest of revenge, destruction and conquest in this exciting retro Action RPG title. Along the way you'll unlock ancient mysteries, discover legendary weapons, relics and magic...and of course kill thousands of those foolish enough to stand in your way!
